title: Provides for cost-of-living adjustments of disability benefits for an employee with a permanent total disability
summary: Provides for cost-of-living adjustments of disability benefits for an employee with a permanent total disability to be based on an increase of the consumer price index as promulgated by the U.S. department of labor.

       AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to  providing
         for cost-of-living adjustments of disability benefits in certain cases

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 15 of the workers' compensation law is  amended  by
    2  adding a new subdivision 10 to read as follows:
    3    10.  COST-OF-LIVING  ADJUSTMENTS  OF  DISABILITY  BENEFITS  IN CERTAIN
    4  CASES. (A) NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW,  IN  ADDITION  TO
    5  ANY  OTHER  AMOUNT RECEIVED PURSUANT TO THIS ARTICLE AS DISABILITY BENE-
    6  FITS, AN EMPLOYEE WITH A PERMANENT TOTAL DISABILITY OR THE  BENEFICIARY-
    7  DEPENDENT OF SUCH EMPLOYEE SHALL BE ENTITLED TO AN ADDITIONAL ALLOWANCE,
    8  TO BE KNOWN AS A COST-OF-LIVING ADJUSTMENT ALLOWANCE, PAYABLE ANNUALLY.
    9    (B)  THE  COST-OF-LIVING  ADJUSTMENT  ALLOWANCE  SHALL  BE COMPUTED BY
   10  APPLYING AN ADJUSTMENT FOR REGIONAL COSTS OF LIVING AND SHALL  BE  BASED
   11  ON  FIFTY  PERCENT OF THE ANNUAL INCREASE IN THE CONSUMER PRICE INDEX AS
   12  PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF LABOR.

   14  208-a to read as follows:
   15    S  208-A. COST-OF-LIVING ADJUSTMENTS OF DISABILITY BENEFITS IN CERTAIN

   18  AN  EMPLOYEE WITH A PERMANENT TOTAL DISABILITY OR THE BENEFICIARY-DEPEN-

   20  BE KNOWN AS A COST-OF-LIVING ADJUSTMENT ALLOWANCE, PAYABLE ANNUALLY.
